SELECT c.SCH_CODE as schCode, c.SCH_NAME as schNm, FN_DAYCONVERT(c.SCH_STARTDAY) as schStartday, FN_DAYCONVERT(c.SCH_ENDDAY) as schEndday, d.CON_SEQ as conSeq, d.con_nm as conNm FROM TB_DIDINFO a, TB_GROUPDID b, TB_SCHEDULE c, TB_CONTENTMUTIL d WHERE a.DID_ID=#{didId} AND a.did_id = b.DID_ID AND b.GROUP_CODE = c.GROUP_CODE AND c.CONTENT_CODE = d.con_seq
AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= c.SCH_ENDDAY
ORDER BY c.SCH_ENDDAY ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RNUM, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.DID_ID as "didId", A.DID_NM as "didNm", A.DID_IPADDR as "didIpaddr", B.CENTER_NM as "centerNm", CASE A.DID_STTUS WHEN 'N' THEN 'OFF' ELSE 'ON' END AS didSttus, A.DID_USEYN as "didUseYn", EMARTCMS.fn_DetailCodeNm(A.DID_OS) as didOs, a.DID_MAC as didMac, c.GROUP_NM AS roleNm,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SCHEDULE WHERE GROUP_CODE=(SELECT group_code FROM TB_GROUPDID WHERE did_id=a.did_id) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= SCH_ENDDAY ) AS schCnt
FROM TB_DIDINFO a, TB_CENTERINFO b, LETTNAUTHORGROUPINFO c WHERE a.CENTER_ID = B.CENTER_ID AND a.role_code = c.group_id
and a.DID_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and a.DID_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and ( a.ROLE_CODE in (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM LETTNAUTHORGROUPINFO WHERE parent_group_id = #{groupCode} ) OR a.ROLE_CODE = #{groupCode} )
and A.DID_MODELTYPE in ('DIDRMODELTYPE01', 'DIDRMODELTYPE02')
and A.DID_MODELTYPE = 'DIDRMODELTYPE03'
AND a.CENTER_ID = #{centerId}
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) TB ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
